input.sentences: there was a very important rally going on today .
these people were trying to show others what was going on in their lives .
many people joined them throughout the day .
it made for a very big rally .
at the end of the day i was glad that i was able to be there to witness it .
output.sentences: i went to a rally today to supprt these people
everyone was very excited to fight for their cause
more and more people kept showing up
they got a little rowdy sometimes
by the end of the day they got their point across.
